Masterclass 2

22 Dec 2014

I'm an Double bass player. Now I remembered that I couldn't decide on which instrument to practice the exercises. He says that they should be on your live own instrument but on the other hand that people with no musical experience can both learn perfect pitch. I'm a python programming hobbyist and I will try to write all the practices.

Keywords

Relative and perfect pitch are both important. Relative pitch help us to say that the chord is dominant:9 and perfect pitch is helping us to hear that it is on tone d. Absolute means non changing. A has always the same sound. It is absolute.

Different levels:

  • color awareness
  • color discrimination (12 chromatic pitch colors) - quality of sound

Exercise

Go to your own instrument and have a listen, here for yourself that this color sounds do exist.

Masterclass 1

21 Dec 2014

Perfect pitch sounds so long good until you take your pace to practice it. It's always hard to learn something new. It takes time and energy.

I didn't buy the program. I found it on GrooveShark website. Here is a little of the supercourse.

Keywords

Performer can only preform as well as he can here. A composer can only compose what he can think up. And you can only think up what your ear can comprehend, what your ear can grasp. You can only appreciate and enjoy whatever your own perception and awareness allows you to enjoy. It is all dependent on your own musical awareness. Perfect pitch is the color in music (black and white TV example. Its a delicate perception which opens up the ear in all area of music. Its something which is already in our ear.
